name: trino-mcp-remote
description: Connect to remote Trino MCP server for SQL analytics
long_description: This extension connects MCP clients to remote Trino MCP servers using mcp-remote. It provides access to Trino SQL query engine through MCP tools including execute_query, list_catalogs, list_schemas, list_tables, and get_table_schema.

server_url.title: Trino MCP Server URL
server_url.description: The URL of your Trino MCP server endpoint

tools.name: execute_query
tools.description: Execute SQL queries against Trino databases

tools.name: get_table_schema
tools.description: Get table structure and column information
